sentence: It was amazing Jumeirah beach is still one of my favorites
We enjoyed the beach a lot and the watersports center is right outside
Very clean hotel and beaches
The room was spacious and clean views of beach pools and The Burj al Arab were fantastic
Stayed at the Jumeirah beach hotel a while back for business and it provided a good service in a good location
This is one of the early classic hotels of Dubai and is situated by the Burj Al Arab which ensures great and interesting views from all rooms as they all face the sea
The beach was fabulous we enjoyed walking along each evening taking so many photos of the Burj al Arab
Liked all the extras like beach bag and flip flops
Another amazing trip to theJumeirah Beach Hotel
Best hotel near the beach
The hotel is after renovation so it looks really new and modern including stable wifi even at the beach
Having heard about the hotel refurbishment that ended in October 2018 our family of 4 decided to book a one bedroom ocean suite for the February 2019 UK half term holiday

The hotel is nice the beach is closed for now and there was heavy construction going on pool is decent with a very deep section great for diving and swimming training showers are very busy because simple 3 showers near the pool area is not enough there is no self parking for some reason overall it a good hotel but not my favorite within Jumeirah group of hotels the Jumeirah crekside hotel is far more modern and better rooms overall
It ’s noisy and spoils sunbathing on the beach

we have stayed here many times over many years and just had four items that we were disappointed with which i have n mentioned in the survey they were the exec restuarant flies on the cold meathe exec 24th lounge does not allow shortsthe spa is not as good as previous one the beach bar for reakfoast only open on weekends
So if you have booked a ocean view room then you will get shocked for sure
Work is happening towards Marina beach side so it impacts the beach stretch side towards Marina beach end
You ca n’t sit on the beach or at the pool and relax
In spite of a bad experience this is one of the best locations at the beach in Dubai
Staff on the beach told us to get out of the cabanas unles we paid extra for them
